srgcwscs.ElapsedTime

srgcwscs.ElapsedTime Class Reference

Given an elapsed time in seconds, the method doPause() of this class forces the code to do a pause for a time interval of that size. More...

 Formats a time value in seconds.
static void doPause (int timeInSeconds)
 Forces the code to do a pause for a time interval.

Detailed Description

Given an elapsed time in seconds, the method doPause() of this class forces the code to do a pause for a time interval of that size.

Authors:
Angel A. Juan, Miquel Gilibert, Marcos Fernandez
